labels.text: The Terrazzo series is an early body of work by Wang Guangle. The title refers to the composite material commonly used for floor treatments in socialist China. The seemingly abstract pattern in this work is in fact Wang’s realist depiction of the tiled floors of his childhood home. He painted every pebble in detail, even sanding the surface of the canvas as one would do to polish an actual Terrazzo floor. The minimalist yet photographic quality and time-consuming approach probes the boundary between realism and abstraction. It also reflects the artist’s conscious investigation into western modernist art. Wang is best known for his meticulous process-based canvasses that examine time and the physical act of painting; his artistic style is unusual among artists of his generation.

The Terrazzo series is an early body of work by Wang Guangle. The title refers to the composite material commonly used for floor treatments in socialist China. The seemingly abstract pattern in this work is in fact a realist depiction of the tiled floors of Wang’s childhood home. He painted every pebble in detail, even sanding the surface of the canvas as one would do to polish a terrazzo floor. The minimalist yet photographic quality and the time-consuming approach probe the boundary between realism and abstraction and reflect the artist’s investigation into Western modernist art. Wang is best known for his meticulous, process-based canvases that examine time and the physical act of painting; his artistic style is unusual among artists of his generation.

《水磨石》是王光樂的早期作品系列，而題目所指的「水磨石」，是社會主義中國常用的混合地板物料。作品中的圖案看似抽象，但其實是王光樂兒時舊居地板的寫實描繪。他仔細繪畫每一顆碎石，更以砂紙磨滑畫布，就像為真正的水磨石地板拋光一樣。作品風格簡約而具備照片般的特質，王光樂更花上長時間創作，遊走於寫實主義和抽象主義之間。此外，作品亦反映出藝術家對西方現代藝術的仔細探索。王光樂以一系列嚴謹細密的油畫作品見稱，探討時間與繪畫的實際過程；其風格在同代藝術家中可謂別樹一幟。

images.AltText: Oil painting on canvas of brown and grey terrazzo; a composite flooring treatment. Tiny grey chips and pebbles, in a brown mortar, are realistically rendered in great detail.
images.AltTextTC: 油彩布本作品上呈現棕灰色水磨石，即是以不同物料混合製作的地板物料。灰色的小石屑和鵝卵石，與棕色砂漿混和調合——所有圖案細節都以寫實技巧仔細描繪。
